extendedInfo.description: Do you want to Drive and Kill?Drive through zombies to stay alive, keep killing and fighting!Control your car and plow through massive amounts of zombies as you try to escape.There are tons of bonus and upgrades to keep you busy all day and night...How to play?Press on the right screen to accelerate your carPress on the left screen to slow downThanks for checking out Drive KillNow share it with your friends!Tags: Car games, Racing games, Action games, Adventure games, Killing games

reviews.title: goood
reviews.comment: need new levels and cars etc. just so good so so i just finished playing all stages.
reviews.author: Red Carreon

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Every thing is to much money zombie road trip is alot better
reviews.author: Kyle Stewart

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Why the hell are there rocks on logs, since when was that possible, game design really dumb. Since when did zombies get a hold of crates at all, that doesn\'t make sense. Add a health bar, it\'s annoying when half the time, you fail because your visor touches the ground but flip back over and still fail. Also, the wheels should have more of a grip, they\'re not really off road wheels when there is no difference between any of them.
reviews.author: Gian Cabrera

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: I\'ve finished all the levels and fully upgrade all the cars and all i need is....... Plssss update this app coz\' im so loving it
reviews.author: Jenalyn Mangaliman

reviews.title: A poor attempt at a remake
reviews.comment: Game was fun... First one was better. You focused too much on having more than one stage. The first game was fine with one stage. There is no story. The special boosts are gone and the only other thing that changed was the 18-wheeler.  Bring back fun stuff from the first Drive-Kill and maybe add more vehicles and this will be a 5 star game.
reviews.author: A Google User
